content: I’m a final-year student pursuing B.Tech from Jamia Millia Islamia in Electronic and Communication. Currently doing research internship at IIITD. I have a major interest in programming and problem-solving. I have good knowledge of Machine Learning (And AI) and am interested in Research in ML or DL domains. I have done a good amount of projects (Listed Below) to support my skills. I also have good knowledge and experience in Web development (Both FrontEnd and Backend).
summary: I’m a final-year student pursuing B.Tech from Jamia Millia Islamia in Electronic and Communication. Currently doing research internship at IIITD. I have a major interest in programming and problem-solving. I have good knowledge of Machine Learning (And AI) and am interested in Research in ML or DL domains.
title: Mohammad Ahmad

summary: A Machine Learning Blog, completely built from scratch. It has almost all the features a traditional blog has like commenting, bookmark, likes, auth, etc. Tech Stack - Node.js, React.js, Bootstrap, and PostgreSQL.
title: Code-ml

summary: A Web application to recognize faces and identify it, One can train it by entering the name and their pics in the browser, this is done by using Pre-trained model mobilenet_v1_1 from Tensorflow Hub.
title: Face Recognition Using Tensorflow.js

summary: Detection of popular Reddit flair on “r/india/” subreddit. This project includes data scraping, EDA, modeling, and Heroku deployment.
title: Reddit Flair Detection

summary: Web Application built on HTML, CSS, and javascript, which analyze toxicity in a given Text using a Pre-trained model from Tensorflow Hub.
title: Toxic Text Analysis Using Tensorflow.js
